page.title: 01LANDSCAPE THE GRIMSTEADS
page.content: THE GRIMSTEADS. This area consists of two villages and some scattered dwellings set in surroundings of wooded countryside, secluded pasture and open farmland. The Grimsteads, East and West, comprise mainly of modern housing. Neither village has any shops, post offices, or public houses, though both have churches and village halls. There is a school and a chapel at West Grimstead. The small recreation ground at West Grimstead is used as a playground by the school. The main part of the village is situated on the West Dean to Alderbury road. The distance between the Grimsteads is approximately two miles.
